Reviews.Title: Phone feed back
Reviews.Author: courtney baker
Reviews.Content: The phone meet the expectations, the dual band is awesome, it was convenient for my international vacation. The shopping experience was easy and safe

Reviews.Title: BLU 4.5
Reviews.Author: YOLANDA DAVIS
Reviews.Content: Love it! Phone met all my expectations. This phone is good if you want a smaller screen. I also have the BLU studio 5.5 which is way larger... in comparison to Galaxy Note. I love that one as well. Blu products are great!!

Reviews.Title: Dual SIM Android
Reviews.Author: Adrian Warner
Reviews.Content: Very good phone. Looking for a full featured international GSM phone.  This is it. Plus unlocked gives it the extra value.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone for domestic and international use
Reviews.Author: M. O.
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone about a month ago as my first smartphone and almost immediately, had to go to India for an extended period. This review isn't meant to be an extensive/comprehensive review of the phone; rather, I wanted to make a comment on how useful the dual SIM feature has been. I normally replace my US SIM card with an int'l SIM card whenever I travel abroad, but this time I didn't want to as my provider in the US offers unlimited data and text in almost every country, all included in my regular plan. But since voice calls would cost 20 cents a minute, and because it would be expensive for people in India to send a text message to a US number, I got a local SIM. The set up was simple -- just put the new SIM in the second slot behind the battery and then the phone prompts you to pick which SIM you want as default for which function: for data, for voice, for video calls, and for texting. You also have the choice of picking a SIM each time you perform a function. So for texting back to the US, I pick my US SIM and for texting within India, I pick my local SIM. The phone also allows me to seamlessly pick between using Skype to make calls or dialing directly. I must say that I didn't expect this phone to be this good for a hundred or so bucks. It comes with a ton of apps which I have found useful here, such as google maps/navigation. But most of all, it's been the dual sim feature that has been a lifesaver. I think that with the amount of usage I have had here so far, I would have racked up a bill of over $100 by now, but it has been a tiny fraction of that.

Reviews.Title: TRY BLU
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: This phone is fabulous, when I opened the boxI was totally surprised.  It looked like the moreexpensive phones on the market.  I am so pleasewith my purchase I went back and ordered another model from the BLU line.  This phone works!  Nice features, and sound qualities.  If you are sceptical because you don't know thename, like me,  try it!  The quality surpasses thethe price.

Reviews.Title: Blu 4.5
Reviews.Author: C. Lynn
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for by daughter. Camera not as good as her 5th gen Ipod and touchscreen is a little finicky.It cost 1/4 of the price of her Ipod so no complaints.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: B. Nicol
Reviews.Content: Great phone, great price. These phones come with 2 screen protectors, charger, headphones and a silicone case. There are some covers to choose from online, but they are limited. Phone is running T-Mobile. I would suggest this phone to anyone that does not want to pay a fortune for something that you will be changing out in a couple years.

Reviews.Title: This is not a good phone
Reviews.Author: Elmou
Reviews.Content: This is phone is not worth the price. This phone is not stable.First of all, it's not easy to swap sim cards, you will need needle or pin to remove them.The battery does not hold charge very long.For some reason when trying to view calls history, I get a pop up with list of countries which is annoying. I can't blame it on OS (android). I have another android device and it's stable.

Reviews.Title: BLU products
Reviews.Author: nini
Reviews.Content: I'm generally one not to post any reviews but I definitely had to make a review for this phone. I was really hesitating on whether or not to purchase this product because I never heard of BLU cell phones. After much research and reading many reviews, I went right ahead and purchase the BLU Advance 4.5 unlocked cell phone. I totally love the phone and its definitely worth the money. The phone looks exactly like a samsung phone, you can't even tell the difference!!!! If you are unsure whether or not to purchase this phone ("I know I was") I can definitely tell you its worth the money. I'm very happy with the phone! It comes with a screen protector and a phone cover. By the way the phone does run on a 4g network...this was one of the questions I had when I was looking around for phones!!! You definitely will not regret your purchase!

Reviews.Title: About Phone
Reviews.Author: caleny
Reviews.Content: Love it Very easy to Use Good Working Phone Arrived On time Love that It came With Head Phones An a Case :)

Reviews.Title: Memory card
Reviews.Author: Riva Tambis
Reviews.Content: Yup it met my expectations except for an instance that it cannot read my memory card if i insert one.. Why is it like dat?

Reviews.Title: nice phone

Reviews.Content: i gave my friend she really like it so she ask me where do i bought it because she want another one to gave her mom.

Reviews.Title: The product did not come unlocked
Reviews.Author: Hector Castellano
Reviews.Content: By bringing cell served my country not because I was not unlocked. And the characteristics was saying to buy it unlocked!

Reviews.Title: the product represents everything the brand suggests
Reviews.Author: Jesús salvador pino ferrer
Reviews.Content: the product represents everything the brand suggests a good quality product well packaged with all accessories and parts in a good overall condition new mind as it appears in the image of the company so grateful I recommend the product

Reviews.Title: could be better
Reviews.Author: Mourama
Reviews.Content: The graphics on this phone plain and simple suck, but you get what you pay for and it does what its supposed to do. We use tmoble service with unlimited data text and talk, and there is a signal in most places.

Reviews.Title: very good product meets expectations
Reviews.Author: LUIS FRANCO
Reviews.Content: very good product meets expectations, can be compared to other teams in the market applications, android updated, good team is finally recommend

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Brenda Piercy
Reviews.Content: The only reason I didn't give it 5 Stars is the speaker is not very loud.  I can't hear the other person when I use the speaker phone.  It took a little work to get the apn settings right. But other than that I love the phone. I dropped it and cracked the screen and have ordered another one. I use it with Straight Talk.. Great phone.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nadi "NMR"
Reviews.Content: love the phone bought it for my mom it does everything she wants works great she resides in Jamaica and the dual sim capability is a plus she has no complaints and yes I would recommend to a friend

Reviews.Title: Fancy and awsame!
Reviews.Author: Opmatter
Reviews.Content: It really met and for the most part exceeded my expectation. I've been using in the Caribbean for several months now. It does an excellent job.

Reviews.Title: this phone is nice!!!
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: This phone works well,Thanks!! would consider another phone like this,Do not like that there are no other phone covers available these blu phones

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: temperance
Reviews.Content: Packing is very compact. Items included a screen and phone protector which were a very pleasant surprise. I have used the phone for about 3 weeks and so far, it is very user friendly. When i tried to 'Update Wireless', it kept saying that i have to insert an SD card - not sure what that is. Battery does not last for more than a day, with about 30 mins talk time.  For the price of $110, i cannot complain. Will update if anything else changes.

Reviews.Title: this is a good phone
Reviews.Author: cheryl pitman
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but wish it was more like the s4. It hasnt looked up or dropped a call

Reviews.Title: I love it
